/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and concrete. Shops and stalls are set up along the sides, offering a variety of goods to passersby. The colors in the image are predominantly green, red, and gray, reflecting the vibrant life and urban landscape of the city.
